name: Roman & Ownin'
description:
Welcome, Gladiator! You've been unceremoniously thrown into the Colosseum, without a weapon, to fight for the glory of Rome!

Survive as long as you can, with whatever you can grab. Good luck!

Made for the Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam.

Team

Michael Harrington (Programming)

Patrick Coady (Graphics)

Stephen Harrington (Sound)

Special thanks to:

Ariana Harrington

Brianna Baptista

Font

Manaspace by codeman38

Tools Used

Godot (Engine)

Aseprite (Graphics)

Bfxr (Sound)

Audacity (Sound)

Bosca Ceoil (Music)
